5A1F4B4A.Line1.6D03F: I wish we could. She’s out there with a Prime Evil. But, we’ve been instructed not to follow.

5B6C043C.Line21.6D03F: Fine, go see the Tree. But be very careful.

65381056.Line13.BAE4: No, you’re right about Neyrelle, friend. But there’s still work to be done in Sanctuary.

69E26198.Line15.BAE4: I’m going to the Tree of Whispers.

7337041C.Line19.BAE4: Because it might be our only ally left. And we may soon need allies more than ever.

8E083E4E.Line5.6D03F: So, until we know more, we’ll have to wait.

ABA23009.VoiceDir21.6D03F: Both of these sentences should read as their own thoughts.

C1F13152.Line9.6D03F: No? Then what are you going to do? Go after her, against her will?

E2468CE9.Line7.BAE4: I can’t just sit idly by, waiting for word.

F413C4CC.Line3.6D03F: Wouldn’t even know where to start searching if we did.

FB3FFC35.MenuLabel: “Are we going to look for Neyrelle?”
